channel.title: Please help ::master wont work
channel.description:
if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && c.playerRights >= 2) { for (int i = 0; i < 25; i++) { c.playerLevel[i] = 99; c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
help it doesnt seem to work

item.title: Please help ::master wont work
item.dc:creator: @horses2007 horses2007
item.description:
@horses2007 wrote:

[code]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”)) && c.playerRights == 2) {
for (int i = 0; i < 22; i++) {
c.playerLevel[i] = 99;
c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
}
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
}

}[/code]

Hope this helped
